title: Search Advertising Portfolio
description: Search Advertising Portfolio Class includes fields that defines Portfolio.

searchads:billingState.title: Portfolio Billing State
searchads:billingState.description: Portfolio Billing State indicates whether client should be billed for spend from this Portfolio.

meta:enum.Managed: Client will be billed for the spend from this portfolio
meta:enum.Not Managed: Client will not be billed for the spend from this portfolio

searchads:portfolioGroupId.title: Portfolio Group Identifier
searchads:portfolioGroupId.description: Set of portfolios can be assigned to a portfolio Group. This identifier indicates if portfolio is assigned to a portfolio group.

searchads:portfolioGroupName.title: Portfolio Group Name
searchads:portfolioGroupName.description: Indicates Name of the Portfolio Group if portfolio belongs to a Portfolio Group.
